name: autohidpi
title: AutoHiDPI
description: Automatically enable and disable HiDPI (a.k.a. Retina) mode (layout.css.devPixelsPerPx) for multiple monitor setups.

preferences.name: screenWidth
preferences.title: HiDPI Screen Width (Pixels)
preferences.description: HiDPI mode is enabled when active screen width is at least this value

preferences.name: pixelRatioStr
preferences.title: Pixel Ratio
preferences.description: Pixel ratio to use when HiDPI mode is enabled (for example, 1.5, 1.75, 2 etc.)
